item.title: sanic
item.author: serialt
item.description: sanic å®‰è£… python3 -m venv venv . venv/bin/activate pip3 install sanic helloworld from sanic import Sanic from sanic import text app = Sanic("Myapp") @app.get("/") async def test(request): return text("hello world") if __name__ == "__main__": app.run(host="0.0.0.0", port=8090, workers=4) vscode debug { "version": "0.2.0", "configurations": [ { "name": "Python Debugger: Current File", "type": "debugpy", "request": "launch", "python": "${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/python3", "program": "main.py", // "console": "integratedTerminal", } ] }
